content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'fact_trips_complete' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('dbo'))
CREATE TABLE dbo.fact_trips_complete
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT
    t.VendorID,
    t.pickup_datetime,
    t.passenger_count,
    t.trip_distance,
    t.RatecodeID,
    t.store_and_fwd_flag,
    pu.borough AS Pickup_Borough,
    pu.zone AS Pickup_Zone,
    do.borough AS Dropoff_Borough,
    do.zone AS Dropoff_Zone,
    t.payment_type,
    t.fare_amount,
    t.extra,
    t.mta_tax,
    t.tip_amount,
    t.tolls_amount,
    t.improvement_surcharge,
    t.total_amount,
    t.congestion_surcharge,
    t.service
FROM
    dbo.combined_taxi_trips_staged AS t
LEFT JOIN dbo.zones_staging AS pu
    ON t.PULocationID = pu.locationid
LEFT JOIN dbo.zones_staging AS do
    ON t.DOLocationID = do.locationid;
